005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunctionExecutor;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023
024/**
025 * Provides a generic implementation of methods defined by <a href=
026 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#numeric-value-functions">XPath 3.1
027 * Functions on numeric values</a>.
028 */
029public final class NumericFunction implements IFunctionExecutor {
030
031  @NonNull
032  private final INumericExecutor executor;
033
034  @NonNull
035  static IFunction signature(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String name, @NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
036    return IFunction.builder()
037        .name(name)
038        .namespace(namespace)
039        .deterministic()
040        .contextIndependent()
041        .focusIndependent()
042        .argument(IArgument.builder()
043            .name("arg1")
044            .type(INumericItem.type())
045            .zeroOrOne()
046            .build())
047        .returnType(INumericItem.type())
048        .returnZeroOrOne()
049        .functionHandler(newFunctionHandler(executor))
050        .build();
051  }
052
053  @NonNull
054  static IFunction signature(@NonNull QName qname, @NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
055    return signature(
056        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(qname.getNamespaceURI(), "the namespace URI must not be null"),
057        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(qname.getLocalPart(), "the localpart must not be null"),
058        executor);
059  }
060
061  @NonNull
062  static NumericFunction newFunctionHandler(@NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
063    return new NumericFunction(executor);
064  }
065
066  private NumericFunction(@NonNull INumericExecutor executor) {
067    this.executor = executor;
068  }
069
070  @Override
071  public ISequence<INumericItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
072      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
073      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
074      IItem focus) {
075
076    ISequence<? extends INumericItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
077        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
078    if (sequence.isEmpty()) {
079      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
080    }
081
082    INumericItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
083    if (item == null) {
084      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
085    }
086
087    INumericItem result = executor.execute(item);
088    return ISequence.of(result);
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Implementations of this interface are used to execute a numeric opertaion on
093   * the provided item.
094   */
095  @FunctionalInterface
096  public interface INumericExecutor {
097    /**
098     * Perform the execution using the provided {@code item}.
099     *
100     * @param item
101     *          the item to operate on
102     * @return the numeric result from the execution
103     */
104    @NonNull
105    INumericItem execute(@NonNull INumericItem item);
106  }
107}
